long_description: Proven in the professional peloton, the Continental Competition tubular tire delivers excellent all-around road performance. Black Chili compound and small diamond tread pattern delivers excellent all-around performance, supplying great traction, longevity and low rolling resistance. Thin, light and flexible Vectran(TM) puncture resistant strip offers puncture protection without deadening tire performance. 180 tpi casing offers a flexible, supple ride quality. Recommended pressure for the Continental Competition tubular tire is 110 psi (7.5 bar), maximum 170 psi (12 bar); 35mm Presta valve length. Please note: this tire is not compatible with clincher wheels.
short_description: Proven in the professional peloton, the Continental Competition tubular tire delivers excellent all-around road performance.
